actionTemplate.title: Subtle daily liner to elongate eyes
steps: Start at outer corner and extend a tiny tail
Draw liner along lash line to about 2/3 of the eye
Connect the tail back into the lash line
Fill gaps between lashes; keep thickness minimal
Soften with a swab or small brush if too sharp

rationaleTemplate: Minimal thickness makes eyes look longer without heaviness
Filling lash gaps gives definition even with short liner
